title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the core CLI and server to download, build and run large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server, published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, installable from PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration package that adds Ollama as a supported LLM backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI) that supports chat, model management and RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java client library for Ollama, available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Lightweight Node.js CLI wrapper around the Ollama REST API, published on npm.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem providing a clean client for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that brings local AI code suggestions via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET community SDK for Ollama with strong typing and async support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose examples for running Ollama containerized with GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app example consuming the Ollama REST API, useful as a starter template.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Python template showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds a sidebar chat powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js client for Ollama with both callback and promise styles.

title: ollama-kit
summary: Swift package for integrating Ollama into macOS/iOS apps via Swift Concurrency.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama, importable as github.com/ollama/ollama/api.
